file_insights.changes: Added 9 new lines at the beginning of the file
sections_added: Environment Configuration section with ENVIRONMENT variable
Secrets Encryption section with ENCRYPTION_KEY documentation

patterns_discovered.description: Comments explain purpose, valid values, and how to generate values
patterns_discovered.benefit: Improves developer onboarding and setup clarity

patterns_discovered.description: Environment-level settings placed before API-specific settings
patterns_discovered.benefit: Logical organization makes configuration easier to navigate

patterns_discovered.description: Includes Python command for generating encryption keys
patterns_discovered.benefit: Reduces friction for developers setting up secrets

gotchas_discovered.description: ENCRYPTION_KEY is commented out with explanation, not required by default
gotchas_discovered.impact: Low - clearly marked as optional with instructions
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Comment clearly explains when and how to enable

gotchas_discovered.description: ENVIRONMENT variable controls which .env file is loaded
gotchas_discovered.impact: Medium - requires understanding of environment management system
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Documented in inline comment with example values

approach_outcome.summary: Configuration example file successfully enhanced with environment and encryption setup documentation
approach_outcome.completeness: Fully implemented - all new configuration options added with comprehensive documentation
quality_indicators: Maintains backward compatibility with existing ANTHROPIC_API_KEY section

recommendations.recommendation: Create corresponding documentation in README or SETUP.md
recommendations.rationale: New ENVIRONMENT and ENCRYPTION_KEY options should be documented in project setup guide

recommendations.recommendation: Add validation schema or documentation for environment values
recommendations.rationale: Clarify that only 'development', 'staging', 'production' are valid ENVIRONMENT values

recommendations.recommendation: Consider adding example encryption key format in comment
recommendations.rationale: While Python command is provided, showing sample base64 format would help
Helpful for production deployments to understand key management
